column4: Anyone (I've helped in the last hours ;-) knowing C here willing to help me with a small problem (the folks in #c are like "read a book first" ...)?
yes, I'll bite. But it's offtopic for this channel, you'll have to PM me...
Hello and thanks again for your help analysing the C source code yesterday. I managed to put a 0x01 at the right place (just using echo and dd) and saved a whole LVM volume from being lost.
